intro.text: Wind billows from the tracheal caverns to the East. Rot rides it, and the stench of blood fills your nostrils. The assault on your senses pulls you out of slumber. Your neurons flood with epinephrine. Panic. You are not supposed to be here. This place is for the heretics, the doomsayers, the criminals and degenerates. You must escape. Escape, before all is drowned in welcome silence. Escape, before your life is locked and failing within a...

gstart.text:
Your name is Kargunt. You awaken from a deep, drugged slumber within a horribly humid, oozing cavern.
The walls are the texture of tanning leather, the ground squelches beneath your feet.
Bioluminescence brightens the chamber, flooding from tranluscent webbing in the ceiling.

GetWeap.text: Instinct compels you to search for a weapon. Lodged within the wall of the cavern lies a shard of osseous matter. You grip the bone and wrench it free, blood oozing from the hole you've left in its place. [+1 Beinrýtingur]

GiveUp.text:
If someone went through all the effort to drug and drag you down here, then surely you must have done something to deserve it.
You close your eyes and quietly accept your fate.
Warmth surrounds you, your flesh becoming one with the chasm.
You have been consumed.

Advance.text:
You survey the fleshy chamber. There are three passageways.
A narrow crawlspace to the North, a wide but dark opening to the West, 
and an illuminated, windy corridor to the East.
Which passage sings to you?

GameOver.text: You have been slain. Your journey ends here.

Victory.text: {{enemy_name}} lies dead at your feet. {{points}} points absorbed.

rooms.name: Cavern
rooms.description: a damp and dark cavern of flesh, echoing with the sounds of dripping fluid.

rooms.name: Corridor
rooms.description: a dry and brown corridor lined with yellowish polyps.

rooms.name: Triangular
rooms.description: an unsettling, perfectly triangular room. The flesh here has calcified and crystallized.

rooms.name: Gore Pit
rooms.description: a pit filled with congealed blood and twisted remains, where the air is thick with the stench of decay.

rooms.name: Skeletal Antechamber
rooms.description: an antechamber adorned with shattered bones and desiccated remnants, its walls pulsating with a sickly glow.

rooms.name: Chamber of Whispers
rooms.description: a chamber where the walls seem to breathe, whispering secrets in a chorus of unsettling, infantile murmurs.

rooms.name: Fleshy Vault
rooms.description: a vault that pulsates in rhythm, its walls draped in soft, quivering tissue, giving the sensation of being watched.

rooms.name: Vein Passage
rooms.description: a narrow passageway that resembles a vein, pulsing rhythmically, with a slick glistening surface underfoot.

events.name: Nothing
events.description: The room is empty and quiet, naught for the dripping of mysterious fluids.

events.name: Pit Trap
events.description: You hear a click. The ground beneath you gives way as a pit trap opens up.

events.name: Soothsayer
events.description: A robed figure materializes out of the shadows. 'I can see your fate,' they whisper.

events.name: Monster
events.description: A weak monster approaches, its grotesque form hunched and staggering towards you.

events.name: Merchant
events.description: A figure wearing a hooded cloak gestures for you to approach. 'Care to trade?' they ask.

enemies.name: Crowmeat
enemies.description: a grotesque abomination, with shiny pink flesh and a malnourished humanoid frame. Its head is a poor facsimile of a raven.

enemies.name: Blood-Drenched Skeleton
enemies.description: the shambling form of a once-person. Its skeletal frame is shiny with bright red viscera.

Beinrýtingur.description: A sharp dagger of bone ripped from the chasm.

Crowblade.description: The long talon that extends up the forearm of Crowmeat.
